description: All the features you expect from a GORE-TEX PACLITE® shell with minimal weight and bulk–the Liquid Point Shell provides light and durable protection from unexpected alpine squalls.
name: Black Diamond Liquid Point Shell - Mens

specs.value: Gore-Tex® Paclite® 2.5 L, 75D plain-weave face with DWR finish - 125 gsm, 100% polyester
